channel.title: Talks By W. Grant Bangerter
channel.description: General Conference talks by W. Grant Bangerter.

image.title: General Conference talks by W. Grant Bangerter.

item.title: The Power of the Priesthood
item.description: My dear brethren, I believe that what I have to say is a companion to what Bishop Brown has already spoken tonight. And I trust that the Spirit of the Lord will bless its delivery.

item.title: The Voice of the Lord Is unto All People
item.description: President Kimball has already suggested that what we say may be supportive of the things he has already declared. “God, who at sundry times and in divers manners spake in time past unto the fathers by the prophets,

item.title: Teaching by the Spirit
item.description: Central to the calling to administer the gospel to all people, living and dead, is the power of the Holy Ghost. My experience tells me that many who labor in the callings of the priesthood lack insight into this great agency and are unable to be as e

item.title: What Temples Are For
item.description: Others today here have spoken about the temple, but last November, at the dedication of the Jordan River Temple, we held three services a day for five days, and we didn’t say it all. This is a good time to talk about temples, and I would like to expl
